name: Gunslinger (Fresh Networks)
description:
How to Play:

There is no menus or loading screens. All you must do is click when the green bar lines up with the arrow. If you hit the green bar properly, then you will shoot first. If not, then the enemy will shoot first.

Reason for Development:

This game was developed to test out a sliding bar mechanic to click at the right time and to implement a gunslinger idea.
